Package org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver.compactions

Class StripeCompactionPolicy.BoundaryStripeCompactionRequest

java.lang.Object
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver.compactions.StripeCompactionPolicy.StripeCompactionRequest
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver.compactions.StripeCompactionPolicy.BoundaryStripeCompactionRequest
Enclosing class:
StripeCompactionPolicy
private static class StripeCompactionPolicy.BoundaryStripeCompactionRequest extends StripeCompactionPolicy.StripeCompactionRequest
Request for stripe compactor that will cause it to split the source files into several separate files at the provided boundaries.
